item.title: Hello world!
item.description:
I will be writing about ideas and projects I have been working on, in my areas of interest: software, security, electronics, 3D printing, DIY, and so much more.

Thanks for checking out my little place on the internet, and I hope you’ll enjoy the content! - CÄƒlin

Disclaimer: Some of my writing might be technically or politically incorrect, or might make no sense at all. We are human after all. Constructive feedback is always appreciated!
